entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
